abstracts.cdata!:
The Industrial Finance Restructuring
            Project will help the Government to undertake a financial
            restructuring program of industrial corporations on a
            selective basis. The project is conceived as a pilot effort
            that will be replicative in restructuring efforts carried on
            outside the project. The project will include assistance
            for: (a) establishing and financing the institutional
            framework through which corporate restructurings will be
            devised, negotiated, and implemented; and (b) financing the
            purchase of capital goods and working capital necessary to
            maintain and increase production.
